entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 01:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
